problem_text_cn: 如图,两条直线被三条平行线所截,已知AB=3,DE=4,EF=7,则BC的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, two straight lines are intercepted by three parallel lines, it is known that AB = N_0, DE = N_1, EF = N_2, then the length of BC is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵两条直线被三条平行线所截,∴\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{DE}{EF},即\frac{3}{BC}=\frac{4}{7},解得:BC=\frac{21}{4}；故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行线分线段成比例定理；由平行线分线段成比例定理得出比例式是解决问题的关键．
